mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as userid, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where categoryList=3 and a.writer=b.usernum order by id
select a.id, a.title, a.content, b.id as userid, a.categoryList, a.heart, a.postdate, a.views from board_post a, users b where a.categoryList=3 and a.writer=b.usernum and a.id=#{param1}
select * from (select id, lead(id,1,9999) over(order by id) as next, lag(id,1,0) over(order by id) as prev from board_post where categoryList=3) where id=#{param1}
